announcement.goals.stupid_express.amnesi: Steal a role from a body and act as that role!
announcement.goals.stupid_express.arsoni: Douse all players and ignite them to win!
game.win.stupid_express.arsonist: The Arsonist has doused all players and set the train ablaze!
item.stupid_express.jerry_can.tooltip: Interact on a player to douse them in oil.
item.stupid_express.lighter.tooltip:
When this goes on cooldown, that indicates it is time to ignite.
Interact with this to ignite all currently doused players
when the time has come.
announcement.goals.stupid_express.necrom: Bring back the dead to have them do your bidding!
hud.stupid_express.necromancer.possible_: Interact to revive this player as a killer!
hud.stupid_express.necromancer.no_possib: One of your killer cohorts must die before you revive!
hud.stupid_express.necromancer.cooldown: You must wait %ss before attempting this.
announcement.goals.stupid_express.avaric: Be near victims and get rich!
game.win.stupid_express.lovers: The pair managed to stay alive until they were the last two standing!
hud.stupid_express.lovers.notification: You are in love with someone on the train!
announcement.goals.stupid_express.initia: Eliminate the other initiate in order to become a killer!
stupid_express.config.rolesSection.necro: If true, the Necromancer will have a shop alongside its abilities.
stupid_express.config.rolesSection.arson: If true, the Arsonist will not just count towards the neutral roles and keep the game going until they're the last standing or dead.
stupid_express.config.modifiersSection.l: If true, the Lovers get a preview of their lover's skin and name on their indicator.
If one of the Lovers is a killer and this is true, the lovers win alongside killers.
If both of the Lovers is a civilian and this is true, the lovers win alongside civilians. Otherwise, they will need to be eliminated for the game to end.
